topics.body:
"For both of them, this was the first time they had felt safe since Cairo. Surrounded by the church, with the war far behind and the world ahead, they felt invincible. For now, all they had to worry about was the moment, and they could enjoy the company of the other with nothing to worry about. For Sahle, this was the first silence he had been comfortable in. A perfect silence.

Sahle looked into her remaining eye, its depth and feeling making up for the one that had been lost. And in it, he felt inspired.

"Let's fuck." he said.

Aaliyah blushed. "Right now?" she asked. Her voice became a whisper and she leaned in closer. "In a church. In this church?"

"Yah." Sahle replied. "A place is a place, and holy people have been to more placed then where they were born. Imagine all the people who fucked in Jesus's house?""

"I love the people I write with,":http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/860113-precipice-of-war-the-ultimate-political-and-politically-incorrect-highschool-rp/page__st__2740#entry28459178 Lol!
topics.author: 4fe4bf947f123b175b000001

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52e968456368722fda7c0100#post_52e968456368722fda7c0100

They do, and they're called "Copts":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Copts

They were also a point of contention on the build up to the Egyptian Revolution with Islamists attacking them and much of the friendlier Islamic community rallying for their defense.

But in that post they're not technically in Egypt anymore. That's in Nazareth and their in the Church of the Nativity. They're trying to flea from the Ottomans while going through Ottoman territory to get to Armenia, because a large part of Africa isn't really friendly to the main character in that arch of my friend's.

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52ec7cc263687274767c0100#post_52ec7cc263687274767c0100

Between what I know from the ChipCheezum LP of the game and the port, all seems to be in order.

Granted, I keep trying to be hot shit and failing at it.

Granted, my definition of playing thus far has been to mash left and right click randomly as I WASD between random enemies, sometimes with ninja run held down. Other times missing the button for that, and hitting Blade Mode instead and messing up my rythm.

And then there's the placement of some of the actions in weird spots, and I can't map anything to my third and fourth mouse buttons. The dodge button would be most useful there, and not on "Z". Or X, whatever it is.

"@AaronMk":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52ec7f676368724303030000#post_52ec7f676368724303030000
So far only a few chickens and a kobold thief who got just fucking trampled by every single dorf the minute he came near the fortress.

I'm not sure how the chickens died, but I'm thinking badgers. I've noticed a few of the fuckers running around on the map, but the game didn't deign to notify me if they're killing the chickens. Be patient, it takes a little while to get to the really good stuff.
